fields.description:
Use this template for recurring meeting agendas, like team meetings and 1:1's. To use this board:
* Participants queue new items to discuss under "To Discuss"
* Go through items during the meeting
* Move items to Done or Revisit Later as needed
Use this template to organize your life and track your personal tasks.
Use this template to stay on top of your project tasks and progress.
Use this template to set and accomplish new personal goals.
Use this template to plan and organize your editorial content.
Use this template to plan your roadmap and manage your releases more efficiently.
Mattermost Boards is an open source project management tool that helps you organize, track, and manage work across teams. Select a card to learn more.

Mattermost Boards makes it easy for you to update certain properties on cards through our drag and drop functionality. Simply drag this card from the **Later** column to the **Completed** column to automatically update the status and mark this task as complete.
Drag this card from the **Now** to **Completed** column to automatically update the status and mark this task as complete.
Create and manage checklists, like this one... :)
Add and update descriptions with Markdown
Follow cards to get notified on the latest updates
Add description content such as text, images, divider lines, and checkboxes
Provide feedback and ask questions via comments
@mention teammates so they can follow, and collaborate on, comments and descriptions
Provide feedback and ask questions using Comments
Cards allow your entire team to manage and collaborate on a task in one place. Within a card, your team can:
Try creating your own board by clicking on the "+" button on the top of the left hand sidebar. Choose from one of our default templates or start from scratch with an empty board.
Congratulations! You're now a Boards expert üòÑ
A board helps you manage your project, organize tasks, and collaborate with your team all in one place.

To create your own board, select the "+" on the top of the left hand sidebar. Choose from one of our standard templates and see how they can help you get started with your next project:

- **Project Tasks**: Stay on top of your project tasks, track progress, and set priorities. 
- **Meeting Agenda**: Set your meeting agendas for recurring team meetings and 1:1s.
- **Roadmap**: Plan your roadmap and manage your releases more efficiently.
- **Personal Tasks**: Organize your life and track your personal tasks.
- **Content Calendar**: Plan your editorial content, assign work, and track deadlines.
- **Personal Goals**: Set and accomplish new personal goals and milestones.
Share the board with your team internally by copying the internal link:
Keep stakeholders and customers up-to-date on project progress by sharing your board.
Click on the options menu "..." towards the top right , then select Share board. Set the toggle on to Publish to web and share this board with anyone.
To share a board, select **Share** at the top right of the Board view. Copy the link to share the board internally with your team or generate public link that can be accessed by anyone externally.
Click on the "New" button on the top left header, the "+ New" button below any column, or the "+" button to the right of any columnn header to create a new card.

To create a new card, simply do any of the following:
- Select "**New**" on the top right header
- Select "**+ New**" below any column
- Select "**+**" to the right of any columnn header
Mattermost Boards helps you manage and track all your project tasks with **Cards**.
After you've copied the link, paste it into any channel or Direct Message to share the card. A preview of the card will display within the channel with a link back to the card on Boards.

To share a card, you'll need to copy the card link first. You can:

- Open a card and select the options menu button at the top right of the card.
- Open the board view and hover your mouse over any card to access the options menu button.

Cards can be linked and shared with teammates directly on Channels. Card previews are displayed when shared on Channels, so your team can discuss work items and get the relevant context without having to switch over to Boards.

Organize and find the cards you're looking for with our filter, sort, and grouping options. From the Board header, you can quickly toggle on different properties, change the group display, set filters, and change how the cards are sorted.
From the board header, you can quickly toggle on different properties, change the group display, set filters, and change how the cards are sorted.

Views allow your team to visualize the same cards and data from different perspectives, so they can stay up-to-date in the way that works best for them. To add a new view, go to **Add a new view** from the view drop-down, then select from any of the following views:

- **Board**: Adds a Kanban board, similar to this one, that allows your team to organize cards in swimlanes grouped by any property of your choosing. This view helps you visualize your project progress.
- **Table**: Displays cards in a table format with rows and columns. Use this view to get an overview of all your project tasks. Easily view and compare the state of all properties across all cards without needing to open individual cards.
- **Gallery**: Displays cards in a gallery format, so you can manage and organize cards with image attachments.
- **Calendar**: Adds a calendar view to easily visualize your cards by dates and keep track of deadlines.

From the view drop-down, go to "Add a new view", then select any of the following views:
- **Board:** Create another board view and set new groupings/filters/sorting to quickly toggle between different board views.
- **Table:** Displays cards in a table format with rows and columns.
- **Gallery:** Displays cards in a gallery format with thumbnails of images attached to the card.
- **Calendar:** Adds a calendar view to easily visualize your cards by dates.
Click on the "+Add a property" button on this card to create a new custom property that will apply to all cards on this board.

Customize cards to fit your needs and track the information most important to you. Boards supports a wide range of fully customizable property types. For example, you can:
- Use the **Date** property for things like deadlines or milestones.
- Assign owners to tasks with the **Person** property.
- Define statuses and priorities with the **Select** property.
- Create tags with the **Multi Select** property.
- Link cards to webpages with the **URL** property.
To create a new property, select **+ Add a property** on this card and choose from the list of property types. New properties will apply to all cards on this board.

To mention a teammate use the **@ symbol with their username** in the comments or description section. They'll get a Direct Message notification via Channels and also be added as a [follower](https://docs.mattermost.com/boards/work-with-cards.html#receive-updates) to the card. 

Whenever any changes are made to the card, they'll automatically get notified on Channels.
Collaborate with teammates directly on each card using @mentions and have all the relevant context in one place.
